lines.text: They can't kill you while the world's watching, they'll have to wait 'till the cameras are off.
Some things are best left unsaid, or unseen.
Thanks for the advice, but this is one memory I'd like to keep.
The problem with memories, Major, is that once you have them in your mind, it's very difficult to get rid of them.

I keep seeing her lying there on that gurney. You always think people look like themselves when they die, they don't. You try to remember the good; all that went before, but it's always that last image that grabs you the hardest.
I'm not sure I want it to.
Where there is an asset, there is a liability. Eliminate the latter.
It was you. You killed my wife.
You don't have to thank me.
Friendship, like anything of value, requires delicacy in it's use.
I'm asking you not to abandon us.
The earth is doomed. You can best serve the Taelons by dying when you are told to die.
